### MAA PREP 2013

## Monday

### Evening

Welcome dinner and introductions.  Some ice-breaking modeling activities.

## Tuesday

Unlike your students, you already know the operations and concepts of calculus.  So our first day is about building models, even though some of these use calculus.  Later, we'll introduce some models that motivate topics of calculus, so you can teach calculus in the context of modeling.

* Functions for modeling and their parameters [link](http://rpubs.com/dtkaplan/584)
    * Examples: Snow Tree Crickets `r I(displayFile('../Notes/Functions/SnowTreeCricket',' '))` : World Population [link](../Notes/Functions/WorldPopulation.Rmd) : Tides in Hawaii [link](../Notes/Tides/tides-hawaii.Rmd) : Hill Functions [link](../Notes/Functions/hillFunctions.Rmd) : Cooling Coffee [link](../Notes/Cooling/CoolingCoffee.Rmd) 

* A software tool kit: the `mosaic` package in R.
    * RStudio accounts will be provided 
    * Copies of ["Start R in Calculus"](http://www.amazon.com/Start-Calculus-Daniel-T-Kaplan/dp/0983965897/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1366313996&sr=8-1&keywords=start+r+in+calculus) will be provided
    
* The contour plot approach to two variables [file link](file:///Users/kaplan/kaplanfiles/Github/PREP-2012/Topics/TwoVariables/TwoVariablesIntro.Rmd)

* Polynomials approximation and modeling
    * Examples
        * Straight-line models [link](file:///Users/kaplan/kaplanfiles/Github/PREP-2012/Topics/Functions/LinearFunctions.Rmd)
        * Application in Model Building: Enzyme kinetics Michaelis-Menten dynamics [link](file:///Users/kaplan/kaplanfiles/Github/PREP-2012/Topics/Michaelis-Menten/MichaelisMenten.Rnw) 
        * Notes on polynomials as models. [link](file:///Users/kaplan/kaplanfiles/Github/PREP-2012/Topics/Polynomials/notes-on-polynomials.Rmd) 
        * Selecting model terms from first principles. [link](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5098197/Math135/In-Class/poly2d.pdf)
        * Linear Approximation in Max Heart Rate [pdf](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5098197/PREP2012/max-hr.pdf)
    * Activities : Eyeballing interactions [link](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5098197/Math135/In-Class/eyeball-partials.pdf) : Celebrity Divorce [link](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5098197/Math135/In-Class/celebrity-divorce.pdf) : A mosaicManip applet for visualizing quadratic approximation in two variables. [pdf](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5098197/Math135/In-Class/poly2-approx.pdf)

* Modeling heuristics [link](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5098197/Math135/In-Class/poly2d.pdf)
